task.title: How to Configure an Oracle 11g Data Source

taskbody.prereq: Available in the Enterprise edition only.
taskbody.context: The steps for configuring a data source for connecting to an Oracle 11g server are as follows:

step.cmd: Click the New button in the Data Sources panel.

stepresult.p: The dialog box for configuring a data source is opened.

fig.title: Data Source Drivers Configuration Dialog Box
Data Source Drivers Configuration Dialog Box

step.cmd: Select Oracle in the driver Type drop-down menu.
Add the Oracle driver file using the Add Files button.
step.info: The Oracle driver file is called ojdbc5.jar. The Driver files section lists download links for database drivers that are necessary for accessing Oracle databases in .
